title: Hinting with Microsoft VTT
content:
Search feature being down in this forum I’d like to know if any of you have experiance with Microsoft Visual TrueType. Is it worth trying out? Please enlighten..

 [‹ Helvetica Flair](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143553/http:/typophile.com/node/12101 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typoglycemia ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143553/http:/typophile.com/node/12077 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wallaby

comments.content: Check out [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143553/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4101/32699.html?1081531221). (btw, until search is back, just use Google and add site:typophile.com to your query to restrict the search to Typophile.com).
